1.9.4.0.5.0: Ported the 0.5.0 version from Minecraft 1.9 to 1.9.4

1.9.0.5.0:
Fix a bug where shift + clicking would move two stacks because of the drag feature (only noticeable if the target slot can hold more than one regular stack's worth of items)
Add Ctrl + click dragging to move only one item from all the dragged-over slots
Add separate configs options for all the different dragging modes
Renamed the old dragging config option - thus generating a new config is recommended
1.9.0.4.3:
Add right click dragging
Fix left mouse button's state getting stuck if the inventory is closed while holding the button
1.9.0.4.2: Fix some derps when trying to scroll to/from output-only slots, like Furnace output or crafting output
1.9.0.4.1:
Fix a minor glitch when scrolling the last item to the hovered stack in some inventories
Add Forge update checker support
1.9.0.4.0:
Add config options to enable/disable the new modes
Add hold shift + drag to move items (like Mouse Tweaks) - the movement is interpolated: can handle fast cursor movement
Add special handling for Villagers: hover over the output slot, hold shift and scroll down to fill the recipe inputs (then scroll up to move the output items as usual). So basically hold shift and scroll down/up repeatedly to trade fast & easy.
1.9.0.3.0:
Add new modifier: Ctrl + scroll to move all matching items
Add new modifier: Ctrl + Shift + scroll to move everything
1.9.0.2.3: Don't try to do things on fake slots. Fixes a cross-mod interaction issue/crash.
1.9.0.2.1: Ported the 0.2.1 version from Minecraft 1.8.9 to 1.9
